entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
